data.description:
Experience the groundbreaking thrill of soccer in virtual reality! 

Our VR soccer game lets you immerse yourself in the beautiful game like never before. 
Play full matches with three difficulty levels, diverse formations, and choose between button controls or using your kicks for a more realistic experience.

Hone your skills in dedicated practice modes, mastering penalties, free kicks, curved shots, cross finishing, wall challenges, and ball smashing. 
With five levels of goalkeeper difficulty, test your mettle or opt for target-based challenges.

Take customization to the next level by tuning your virtual shoe for a better fit and adjusting power levels for precision shots. 
Control the ball the way you want—hold the controller in hand, mount it on your knee or ankle, or elevate your gameplay by mounting it on your foot.

For those seeking the ultimate realism, follow our easy tutorial on securely mounting the controller to your feet using two 1.5m/60" strips of elastic fabric. 
Choose your leg, attach the default security fastening, and secure the controller using the strips. Use the in-game shoe tune for a perfect fit.

Always ensure ample space around you for an optimal gaming experience. 

WARNING: Oculus 3 and Pro may pose challenges for foot attachment; use the demo version to determine suitability. 

Elevate your soccer journey with our immersive VR experience—get ready to redefine the way you play!
